other_tests.findings: Identified a heterozygous variant in COL4A1 with a deleterious mutation predicted to replace glycine with arginine at protein position 486.
Showed minimally enlarged kidneys, well-preserved intervening renal parenchyma, and large dominant cysts projecting from the renal cortex.
Confirmed the variant in COL4A1; no deleterious mutations found in PKD1, PKD2, or other associated genes.
